creator: linamaes
sql: SELECT PRINTF('%04d-%02d', "year", "month") AS yearMonth, GBIF_EEARGCode(10000, decimalLatitude, decimalLongitude, COALESCE(coordinateUncertaintyInMeters, 10000)) AS eeaCellCode, basisOfRecord, datasetKey, countryCode, speciesKey, species, family, class, order_, COUNT(*) AS occurrences FROM occurrence WHERE occurrenceStatus = 'PRESENT' AND "year" <= 2024 AND continent = 'EUROPE' AND speciesKey IN (2473663, 2480281, 6178421, 8773033, 7190969, 5844449, 5229142, 5227692, 5227710, 7406504, 6065810, 8151548, 6065841, 2498285, 5959143, 5844831, 6066518, 8250742, 5229360, 7192406, 2481236, 2481240, 6100917, 7191070, 6065721) AND hasCoordinate = TRUE AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'ZERO_COORDINATE') AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'COORDINATE_OUT_OF_RANGE') AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'COORDINATE_INVALID') AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'COUNTRY_COORDINATE_MISMATCH') AND "month" IS NOT NULL GROUP BY yearMonth, eeaCellCode, basisOfRecord, datasetKey, countryCode, speciesKey, species, family, class, order_ ORDER BY yearMonth DESC, eeaCellCode ASC, countryCode ASC
